short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show you the password in plain text when cursor is over password fields or double click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will show you the password in plain text when cursor is over password fields or double click. 

Show password when mouse over password fields.

Have you ever deleted whole password just because you typed a single letter wrong ?
Now you can get rid of it.

You can also change when to show password in options.
